To compare toxicity observe see cohort patient treat carboplatin etoposide alone . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM I : Patients receive oblimersen sodium intravenously ( IV ) continuously day 1-8 , carboplatin IV 30 minute day 6 , etoposide IV 60 minute day 6-8 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . ARM II : Patients receive carboplatin IV 30 minute day 1 etoposide IV 60 minute day 1-3 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 3 month 1 year , every 6 month 2 year .
